channel.title: Activist Checklist - Recent Updates
channel.description: Recent updates and improvements to Activist Checklist digital security guides

item.title: Added "Police at the Door" know your rights poster
item.description: Added the "Police at the Door" know your rights poster.
item.content:encoded: Added the "Police at the Door" know your rights poster.

item.title: Revised travel
item.description: Revised the Travel & Border Checklist to have a simpler "baseline" section separate from the "medium security" and "high security" sections.
item.content:encoded: Revised the Travel & Border Checklist to have a simpler "baseline" section separate from the "medium security" and "high security" sections.
item.author: contact@activistchecklist.org (Activist Checklist)
